column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk:------ (Preliminary Information) On the morning of October 6
column5: police arrested six suspects (*but seven in photo) in connection with a case of human trafficking in Group 12 in Village 3
column7: Sihanoukville.------All six are reported to be Chinese males. Updates to follow.------UPDATE: Latest reports say 10 people were found shackled and tortured.------Update: According to ------later reports------
column8: 10 people were rescued after being found in confinement. ” Preah Sihanouk Provincial Gendarmerie liberated more than 10 victims of kidnapping and illegally detaining and deporting”------At least one was seriously injured and taken to hospital.------POST NEWS
